name: AstroBonkers (Prototype)
description:
It's a prototype - ok? 
Current Version: pre-release 0.2

Move - WSAD
Dash - LShift & Spacebar
Aim & Fire - Mouse, LMB
Special ability - Right click
Reload - R
Quicksave - F1
Quickload - F2
Restart - F3

Upgrades you get out-of-the-box because fuck you:

- Lv. 4 Fat Mags (Increases clip size by 10)

- Lv. 5 Overclock (Automatic Firemode, 1 bullet per 0.1s)

- Lv. 1 Banishment (Hold right click to use. Spins your weapon and nearly triples the firing
speed, but also consumes ammo a lot faster and you cannot aim.)

- Lv. 3 Lite-weight (Increases dash speed and duration)

If you die, that's it. You need to reload the page. You killed your player forever.
